name: Black Desert
description: Black Desert Online is a sandbox, living-world MMORPG.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 for PC is a first-person shooter game, but one with a difference

name: Star Citizen
description: Star Citizen combines features from space simulator, first person shooter, and massively multiplayer online genres across its four playable modes

name: Watch dog legion
description: Watch Dogs Legion for PC is an action adventure game set in a fictionalised alternate reality London

name: Slayer Online
description: Slayers Online is a two-dimensional massively multiplayer amateur online role-playing game developed by Frostfall.

name: World of Warcraft
description: World of Warcraft (WoW) is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) released in 2004 by Blizzard Entertainment. It is the fourth released game set in the Warcraft fantasy universe.
